00079     class edge_by_junction_angle_sorter {
00080     public:

00086

00105     class relative_edge_sorter {
00106     public:
00108         explicit relative_edge_sorter(NBEdge* e, NBNode* n)
00109             : myEdge(e), myNode(n) {}
00110 
00111     public:
00113         int operator()(NBEdge* e1, NBEdge* e2) const {
00114             if (e1 == 0 || e2 == 0) {
00115                 return -1;
00116             }
00117             SUMOReal relAngle1 = NBHelpers::normRelAngle(
00118                                      myEdge->getAngle(), e1->getAngle());
00119             SUMOReal relAngle2 = NBHelpers::normRelAngle(
00120                                      myEdge->getAngle(), e2->getAngle());
00121             return relAngle1 > relAngle2;
00122         }
00123 
00124     private:
00126         NBEdge* myEdge;
00127 
00129         NBNode* myNode;
00130 
00131     };
00132 
00133 
00138     class edge_by_priority_sorter {
00139     public:
00141         int operator()(NBEdge* e1, NBEdge* e2) const {
00142             if (e1->getPriority() != e2->getPriority()) {
00143                 return e1->getPriority() > e2->getPriority();
00144             }
00145             if (e1->getSpeed() != e2->getSpeed()) {
00146                 return e1->getSpeed() > e2->getSpeed();
00147             }
00148             return e1->getNumLanes() > e2->getNumLanes();
00149         }
00150     };

00161     class edge_opposite_direction_sorter {
00162     public:
00167         explicit edge_opposite_direction_sorter(const NBEdge* const e, const NBNode* const n)
00168             : myNode(n) {
00169             myAngle = getEdgeAngleAt(e, n);
00170         }
00171 
00177         int operator()(NBEdge* e1, NBEdge* e2) const {
00178             SUMOReal d1 = getDiff(e1);
00179             SUMOReal d2 = getDiff(e2);
00180             return d1 > d2;
00181         }
00182 
00183     protected:
00188         SUMOReal getDiff(const NBEdge* const e) const {
00189             SUMOReal d = getEdgeAngleAt(e, myNode);
00190             return GeomHelper::getMinAngleDiff(d, myAngle);
00191         }
00192 
00199         SUMOReal getEdgeAngleAt(const NBEdge* const e, const NBNode* const n) const {
00200             if (e->getFromNode() == n) {
00201                 return e->getGeometry().getBegLine().atan2DegreeAngle();
00202             } else {
00203                 return e->getGeometry().getEndLine().reverse().atan2DegreeAngle();
00204             }
00205         }
00206 
00207     private:
00209         SUMOReal myAngle;
00210 
00212         const NBNode* const myNode;
00213 
00214     };
00215

00224     class edge_similar_direction_sorter {
00225     public:
00227         explicit edge_similar_direction_sorter(const NBEdge* const e)
00228             : myAngle(e->getAngle()) {}
00229 
00231         int operator()(NBEdge* e1, NBEdge* e2) const {
00232             SUMOReal d1 = GeomHelper::getMinAngleDiff(e1->getAngle(), myAngle);
00233             SUMOReal d2 = GeomHelper::getMinAngleDiff(e2->getAngle(), myAngle);
00234             return d1 < d2;
00235         }
00236 
00237     private:
00239         SUMOReal myAngle;
00240     };

00317     class same_connection_edge_sorter {
00318     public:
00320         explicit same_connection_edge_sorter() { }
00321 
00323         int operator()(NBEdge* e1, NBEdge* e2) const {
00324             std::pair<SUMOReal, SUMOReal> mm1 = getMinMaxRelAngles(e1);
00325             std::pair<SUMOReal, SUMOReal> mm2 = getMinMaxRelAngles(e2);
00326             if (mm1.first == mm2.first && mm1.second == mm2.second) {
00327                 // ok, let's simply sort them arbitrarily
00328                 return e1->getID() < e2->getID();
00329             }
00330 
00331             assert(
00332                 (mm1.first <= mm2.first && mm1.second <= mm2.second)
00333                 ||
00334                 (mm1.first >= mm2.first && mm1.second >= mm2.second));
00335             return (mm1.first >= mm2.first && mm1.second >= mm2.second);
00336         }
00337 
00341         std::pair<SUMOReal, SUMOReal> getMinMaxRelAngles(NBEdge* e) const {
00342             SUMOReal min = 360;
00343             SUMOReal max = 360;
00344             const EdgeVector& ev = e->getConnectedEdges();
00345             for (EdgeVector::const_iterator i = ev.begin(); i != ev.end(); ++i) {
00346                 SUMOReal angle = NBHelpers::normRelAngle(
00347                                      e->getAngle(), (*i)->getAngle());
00348                 if (min == 360 || min > angle) {
00349                     min = angle;
00350                 }
00351                 if (max == 360 || max < angle) {
00352                     max = angle;
00353                 }
00354             }
00355             return std::pair<SUMOReal, SUMOReal>(min, max);
00356         }
00357     };
00358

00360     friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const EdgeVector& ev);
00361 
00362     class opposite_finder {
00363     public:
00365         opposite_finder(NBEdge* edge, const NBNode* n)
00366             : myReferenceEdge(edge), myAtNode(n) { }
00367 
00368         bool operator()(NBEdge* e) const {
00369             return e->isTurningDirectionAt(myAtNode, myReferenceEdge) ||
00370                    myReferenceEdge->isTurningDirectionAt(myAtNode, e);
00371         }
00372 
00373     private:
00374         NBEdge* myReferenceEdge;
00375         const NBNode* myAtNode;
00376 
00377     };
00378
